System Descriptions

For the challenge, we had 67 registered teams which some of them failed to prepare any valid system for the challenge. Also, some of the teams only participated in the challenge and did not provide any system descriptions which was not in-line with the challenge rules.

In the following, you can find all submitted descriptions. Providing the description in a blind format was decided by teams, so some of the following descriptions do not have any author and affiliation information. The descriptions are ordered based on the anonymous team-ids.

  1. Team01, The SNU-HIL System Description for the SdSV Challenge 2020
  2. Team03, GMM-HMM System for Text-dependent Speaker Verification
  3. Team04, Text-independent Speaker Verification System by Short-Term Voice Phrases for SdSV Challenge
  4. Team05, System description of Team05 for SdSV Challenge 2020
  5. Team06, SdSV Challenge Technical Report: the GREAT system
  6. Team08, I2R’s System Description to Short-duration Speaker Verification (SdSV) Challenge 2020 Text-dependent: Task1
  7. Team08, Team08’s System Description for SdSV Challenge 2020 (Text-independent: Task2)
  8. Team10, The JHU System Description for SDSV2020 Challenge
  9. Team12, DA-IICT Submission for SdSV Challenge
  10. Team13, GIAPSI-UPM System Description for the Text-Dependent SdSV Challenge
  11. Team14, The NetEase Games System Description for Text-dependent Sub-challenge of SDSVC 2020
  12. Team18, The NSYSU+CHT System Description for SdSV Challenge 2020
  13. Team19, Dezhafzar System Description for 2020 SdSV Challenge
  14. Team20, The Team 20 System for Short-Duration Speaker Verification Challenge 2020
  15. Team21, TUSUR (Team 21) Systems Description for the Short-duration Speaker Verification (SdSV) Challenge
  16. Team22, Team22 System Description for SdSV Challenge 2020
